title: Lake Mead National Recreation Area: Donate
body: Donate          You can make a donation to benefit Lake Mead NRA directly to the park. The entire gift will be used for the purpose you identified and no administrative costs will be deducted. The donation is tax deductable. Your check will be deposited in a government account and the full amount will be spent as you intended. For security and other reasons, we cannot accept online donations directly to the park. You can send your check to:   Superintendent Lake Mead NRA 601 Nevada Way Boulder City, NV 89005 Please print the attached .pdf file and select how you would like your donation to be used. Or you can copy and paste the list below into a document and print it on your printer. If you have any questions, please contact Jennifer Haley at (702) 293-8918. Thank you very much. Your donation makes a difference!
